articles.title: Ripple could sell 400 million XRP in June; Largest dump in 7 years - Finbold - Finance in Bold
articles.description: Ripple has prepared its treasury account for what could be the largest monthly XRP dump since 2017. The company has reserved 400 million XRP tokens worth $208 million for its sell-off in June.
